Layers of Solutions within the EnergEyer

Layer-I

Digitalization & Data Analytics

Digitalization

  • Dashboard for real-time monitoring
  • Mobile App for remote monitoring

Data Analytics

  • Anomalies detection
  • Just-in-time assisted process optimization

Layer-II

Gray-Box Digital Twin

Features

  • Identification of location of energy losses
  • Model-assisted process optimization

Layer-III

Predictive Maintenance

Features

  • Data-based analysis of equipment
  • Instabilities report and recommendations
